powerpagecomponent.content: {"description":"The amount of time the Authentication/LoginThrottling/MaxInvaildAttemptsFromIPAddress are to be within before the IP address has to wait Authentication/LoginThrottling/IpAddressTimeoutTimeSpan. Default: 00:03:00 (3 mins)","value":"00:03:00"}
powerpagecomponent.name: Authentication/LoginThrottling/MaxAttemptsTimeLimitTimeSpan
